title: Why mystery gift from riot come so late for me?
body:
Riot y do dis?

I been good little summoner and as a strong independent git gudder i shud of got my mystery gift asap!

And also gimme a job rito. I can type fast! I can be a great player support officer!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Molendo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QNGRKMBa,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-21T18:51:44.081+0000)
>
> And also gimme a job rito. I can type fast! I can be a great player support officer!

But all you need to do in support in copy+paste.
i even asked riot why some people got theres late but they said that its a long process....

I got Pulsefire Ezreal.

I don't even use Ezreal...
IDK why you are complaining, I got suprise party Fiddle {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
